title: A Great Big Bunch of You

sources.title: A Great Big Bunch of You (1932)
sources.description: A Great Big Bunch of You is a 1932 Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies cartoon, directed by Rudolf Ising. The short was released on November 12, 1932. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-great-big-bunch-of-you-1932/

metadata.Plot: A mannequin in the city dump improvises a piano from the junk to play and sing the title song The various animals and pieces of junk all join in.
metadata.Actors: Rudolf Ising, The King's Men, Johnny Murray
